What do you consider rich? 

Would you classify someone who makes $500k in ordinary income (taxed at 35%) the same as someone like warren buffett?

Since Buffett could "make" billions in long term capital gains (if he were to sell his shares, being taxed at 20%) and takes a $1 salary (lowest tax bracket) considering he is able to live off of dividends instead (due to "lowest tax bracket" and has to pay 0% in qualified dividends)?

Buffett is playing by the rules yet due to his situation is "taxed" lower percentage wise compared to the person making $500k in ordinary income
